recipe.name: No-Bake Key Lime Cheese Pie
recipe.ingredients:
1 pre-baked 8- or 9-inch pastry, graham cracker, or cookie crust, room temperature or chilled.
For the lime filling: 2 8-ounce packages cream cheese 1/4 teaspoon salt 1 can sweetened condensed milk 1/2 cup key lime juice
For the whipped cream: 240 grams (1 cup) heavy cream 1 teaspoon vanilla extract 2 tablespoons sugar

step.describe:
To make the cheese filling:
Add the cream cheese and salt.
Scrape down sides of bowl with the spatula.
Scrape down sides of bowl with the spatula. Add the sweetened condensed milk
Scrape down sides of bowl with the spatula.
Scrape down sides of bowl with the spatula. Add the key lime juice.
Scrape down sides of bowl with the spatula.

Scrape down sides of bowl with the spatula.
Fill the crust with the cream cheese mixture and smooth the top. Refrigerate 8 hours or overnight.

To make the whipped cream:
Add all ingredients
Scrape down sides of the bowl.
Scrape down sides of the bowl.

Scrape down sides of the bowl.
The whipped cream should be thick and fluffy and able to hold its shape. If not, repeat the prevous step again, as needed. Do not overwhip, or you will end up with butter.
Transfer the whipped cream to a piping bag fitted with a decorative tip, and decorate the top of the pie, as desired.
Keep refrigerated
